issues.title: Manufacturing and Small Business Support
issues.description: Advocate for policies supporting local manufacturing and small business growth, drawing from her personal experience as an auto repair shop owner

issues.title: Climate Change and Clean Energy
issues.description: Support for renewable energy transition, investments in green infrastructure, and reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Support for expanding healthcare coverage, reducing prescription drug costs, and protecting reproductive healthcare rights

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocate for infrastructure improvements, particularly in rural and suburban areas, focusing on transportation and broadband access

issues.title: Gun Safety Reform
issues.description: Support for comprehensive background checks and responsible gun ownership policies

issues.title: Education and Workforce Development
issues.description: Support for vocational training, community college funding, and apprenticeship programs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Support for comprehensive immigration reform with pathways to citizenship and border security
